attributes.action: Save Our Pinner Centre Pre School
attributes.additional_details:
The Pinner Centre
Chapel Lane car park
Chapel lane
Pinner
Middlesex
HA5 1AA
We have been running for over 30 years. Due to Harrow council making cuts to their funds there are proposals to close Children’s centres within the borough. We are a charity run, committee based Pre School and have found this news very upsetting to discover that due to their cuts we may have to close. We need as many signatures as possible to present a case to keep our Pre School open.
Please take part in signing our petition and spreading the word in helping us reach our goal of 10,000 names.
Thank you for your support.
